hey @dom! It's good to see you, sick avatar.
@dom if your feed loads slowly, you can add feeds to your library to make them available offline and seed them other users.
In your Library, please rename your site to Rotonde(@username), so people trying to seed them know who they are actually seeding.
@dom I didn't even know you could do gradients in SVG.
@dom yup! I'm currently working on the mention tools, it should be working soon enough, and allow for others to jump in and contribute as well.
@dom find that person's feed, by clicking on their name. and paste it here, it will remove it if it's a duplicate.
